Company: Grant Thornton India LLP and Grant Thornton Audit Pty Limited
Description: Grant Thornton India LLP and Australia-based Grant Thornton Audit Pty Limited agreed to settle alleged auditor independence violations that occurred when two Grant Thornton Mauritius partners served on the boards of Mauritius-based subsidiaries of companies that were Grant Thornton audit clients and performed non-audit services prohibited under the SEC's auditor independence rules.

National audit firm Grant Thornton LLP and two of its partners agreed to settle charges that they ignored red flags and fraud risks while conducting deficient audits of two publicly traded companies that wound up facing SEC enforcement actions for improper accounting and other violations.
Grant Thornton LLP agreed to pay $1.5 million to settle allegations relating to a deficient audit of MCA Financial Corporation.

Company: Grant Thornton Fast & ABS Auditores y Consultores Ltda.
